mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (SEQ, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, PAYNUM, HOSPITAL_NAME, PAIDAMOUNT, PAYDATE, APPLYNUM, CANCELDATE, CANCELFLAG, REFUNDDATE, REFUNDFLAG, RESERVATION_SEQ) VALUES(PAYMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{paynum}, #{hospital_name}, #{paidamount}, SYSDATE, #{applynum}, '', 'N', '', 'N', '49')
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, USER_EMAIL, PAYNUM, HOSPITAL_NAME, APPLYNUM, PAYDATE, CANCELFLAG, REFUNDFLAG FROM PAYMENT WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{user_email} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT SEQ, USER_EMAIL, PAYNUM, HOSPITAL_NAME, PAIDAMOUNT, PAYDATE, APPLYNUM, CANCELDATE, CANCELFLAG, REFUNDDATE, REFUNDFLAG FROM PAYMENT WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENT SET CANCELDATE=SYSDATE, CANCELFLAG = CASE WHEN (SELECT r.STATUS FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND (#{status} ='A')) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHERE PAYNUM = (SELECT r.PAYNUM FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND (#{status} ='A'))

UPDATE PAYMENT SET CANCELDATE=SYSDATE, CANCELFLAG = CASE WHEN (SELECT r.STATUS FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND #{status} ='S') IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, REFUNDDATE=SYSDATE, REFUNDFLAG= CASE WHEN (SELECT r.STATUS FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND #{status} ='S') IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHERE PAYNUM = (SELECT r.PAYNUM FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND #{status} ='S')

UPDATE PAYMENT SET CANCELDATE=SYSDATE, CANCELFLAG = CASE WHEN (SELECT r.STATUS FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND (#{status} IN ('S','A','R'))) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , REFUNDDATE=SYSDATE, REFUNDFLAG= CASE WHEN (SELECT r.STATUS FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND (#{status} IN ('S','A','R'))) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHERE PAYNUM = (SELECT r.PAYNUM FROM RESERVATION r WHERE SEQ= #{seq} AND (#{status} IN ('S','A','R')))
